Header.title: techkettle
Header.paragraph: Leading Global ICT solution Company specializing in building sustainable models in the business, health, education and agricultural sector through application of modern technology.

About.paragraph: What makes us who we are today… At TechKettle, we develop innovative and creative products and services that provide total communication and information solutions. Among a plethora of services, web design and development, tailor made applications, ERPs, CRMs, e-commerce solutions, business-to-business applications, business-to-client applications, managed hosting and internet portal management are few that we offer. Satisfied clients around the globe bear testimony to the quality of our work.As a leader in technology exploring, TechKettle is committed to exporting quality software worldwide. The general purpose of TechKettle is to develop and promote advanced information technologies for multi-user operation.TechKettle's business philosophy is to assure the highest quality product, total client satisfaction, timely delivery of solutions and the best quality/price ratio found in the industry. Our emphasis is on offering a high degree of product user friendliness through a positive, creative and focused company staff.

Services.text: We working hard to build a reputation of customer satisfaction through technical excellence and friendly staff

Services.text: We are one of the leading computer service center, we undertake desktop and laptop service with all major brands

Services.name: Digital Marketing
Services.text: We provide the best marketing offers for our clients in e-marketing and achieve their goals and profits significantly.

Services.name: DESKTOP APPLICATION DEV'T
Services.text: We offer innovative solutions in desktop software with high professionalism that achieve completely satisfaction for client.

Services.name: SOFTWARE PROTOTYPING
Services.text: Our UX and UI designers take into account key elements like structure, layout, and flow so users can navigate and log into your software product or application seamlessly.

Testimonials.text: "I have been with TechKettle from the inception of my small company all the way through to what is now a multinational company trading on several continents and have been able to provide exceptional support and advise me all the way through our growth."

Testimonials.text: "TechKettle is above and beyond their competitors and I have talked and met with the others. Some of them wouldn’t even follow up very well when I was just talking to them about them possibly providing services."
Testimonials.name: Habib Mohamed

Testimonials.text: "I know they are going to be honest with me. I am not going to get a subpar product; I know it is going to be good. That is the number one advantage of working with TechKettle because I just do not want to be sold. I want to trust that what I am getting is going to be good."
Testimonials.name: Viola Namulime
